mapper.select: select max(no)+1 as no from qna
mapper.insert: insert into qna(id, title, contents) values(#{id},#{title},#{contents})
mapper.select: select no, id, title, contents, date_format(regdate, '%y-%m-%d') as regdate from qna where no = #{no}
select no, id, title, contents, date_format(regdate, '%y-%m-%d') as regdate from qna order by no desc
